Our meticulously crafted gates not only enhance the aesthetics of your property but also provide unmatched security. Explore our diverse collection and find the perfect gateway to elevate your space. Our Catalog Traditional Iron Gate ₹ 10,000 Order Modern Steel Gate ₹ 15,000 Order Elegant Wooden Gate ₹ 12,500 Order Classic Bamboo Gate ₹ 8,500 Order Antique Brass Gate ₹ 18,000 Order Fancy Wrought Iron Gate ₹ 14,000 Order Who We Are At GateGuru India, we are dedicated to providing the finest gate solutions to our customers across India. With years of experience in the industry, we have established ourselves as leaders in quality, craftsmanship, and customer satisfaction. Our team consists of skilled artisans and professionals who are passionate about creating gates that not only enhance the beauty of your property but also ensure safety and security. Whether it's a traditional iron gate, a modern steel design, or a bespoke wooden creation, we have the expertise and creativity to bring your vision to life. Choose GateGuru India for premium gates that reflect your style and stand the test of time. +91 98 1010 9519 gateguruindia@gmail.com Get in touch Our Services At GateGuru India, we offer a range of services to cater to your gate needs, ensuring both style and security. Contact Custom Gate Design Work with our expert designers to create a bespoke gate that perfectly complements your property. Gate Installation Professionally install your gate with precision and care, ensuring lasting performance. Security Solutions Enhance the security of your premises with our advanced gate security systems and accessories. Expert Consultation Receive personalized guidance and recommendations from our knowledgeable team of gate experts. What materials are your gates made of? Our gates are crafted from a variety of materials including iron, steel, wood, bamboo, glass, and brass, ensuring versatility and durability. Do you offer customization options for gate designs? Yes, we provide custom design services, allowing you to tailor the gate design according to your preferences, style, and architectural requirements. How long does it take to install a gate? The installation time varies depending on the complexity of the project. However, our expert installation team works efficiently to complete the installation process in a timely manner. What security features do your gates offer? Our gates can be equipped with various security features such as electronic locks, access control systems, surveillance integration, and more, ensuring enhanced security for your property. Do you provide maintenance services for gates? Yes, we offer comprehensive maintenance services to ensure the longevity and optimal performance of your gate, including regular inspections, repairs, and upkeep. Can I see samples of your previous projects? Absolutely! We have a portfolio showcasing our previous projects, demonstrating our expertise in gate design, manufacturing, and installation. Feel free to browse through our gallery. Do you provide consultations for gate selection? Yes, we offer expert consultations to assist you in selecting the perfect gate solution for your property. Our knowledgeable team will guide you through the available options and recommend the most suitable design based on your requirements. What is the warranty coverage for your gates? We stand behind the quality of our gates and offer warranty coverage to ensure your peace of mind. The warranty duration and coverage details vary depending on the type of gate and specific terms of the purchase agreement. Can your gates be customized to fit specific dimensions? Yes, we can customize the dimensions of our gates to fit the specific requirements of your property. Our team will work closely with you to ensure the gate perfectly fits the designated space. Do you offer gate automation services? Absolutely! We provide gate automation solutions, including motorization and remote control systems, for added convenience and ease of use. Are your gates suitable for both residential and commercial properties? Yes, our gates are designed to cater to both residential and commercial properties, offering versatility, style, and security for various applications. Do you offer financing options for gate purchases? Yes, we understand that investing in a quality gate is an important decision. That's why we offer flexible financing options to make it easier for you to acquire the gate of your choice. What sets your company apart from others in the industry? At GateGuru India, we take pride in our commitment to excellence, craftsmanship, and customer satisfaction. We strive to exceed expectations with every project, offering innovative designs, superior quality, and unparalleled service. Do you provide delivery services for your gates? Yes, we offer delivery services for our gates to ensure they reach you safely and promptly. Our logistics team will coordinate the delivery process to ensure a seamless experience. How can I request a quote for a gate? Requesting a quote is easy! Simply contact us through our website or give us a call, and our team will be happy to assist you in providing a customized quote based on your specific requirements. What is the typical lifespan of your gates? Our gates are built to last, with durability and longevity in mind. The lifespan of a gate depends on various factors such as material, maintenance, and environmental conditions. However, with proper care and maintenance, our gates can last for many years. Do you offer after-sales support? Absolutely! We are committed to providing exceptional customer service even after the sale. Our dedicated support team is available to address any inquiries or issues you may have regarding your gate, ensuring your satisfaction and peace of mind. pages.privacy: GateGuru India - Premium Gates & Entrance Solutions in India | Privacy Policy Home Catalog Who We Are Our Services FAQ Contact us Write us GateGuru India Privacy Policy GateGuru India ("us", "we", or "our") operates the website (the "Service"). This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal data when you use our Service and the choices you have associated with that data. Information We Collect We collect several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our Service to you. Personal Data Contact Information: When you create an account with us, we collect your name, email address, phone number, and shipping address. Payment Information: If you purchase products through our website, we collect your payment information, including credit card number, expiration date, and billing address. Account Information: We collect information about your account activity, including your order history, wishlist, and product reviews. Log Data We also collect log data that your browser or device automatically transmits when you visit our website. This data may include your device type, browser type, operating system, internet protocol (IP) address, referring/exit pages, and date/time stamps. Cookies and Similar Technologies We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our Service and hold certain information. Cookies are files with small amounts of data that may include an anonymous unique identifier. Cookies are sent to your browser from a website and stored on your device. We also use other tracking technologies, such as web beacons, pixel tags, and JavaScript, to gather and analyze information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our Service. Use of Data GateGuru India uses the collected data for various purposes: To provide and operate the Service To send you important information about the Service, including updates, security alerts, and support messages To process your orders and payments To personalize your experience To monitor and analyze the use of the Service To detect, prevent, and address technical issues To improve the functionality of the Service To provide you with customer support Data Sharing We may share your personal data with third-party service providers who assist us in providing and improving the Service. These providers are obligated to protect your data and only use it on our behalf. We may also disclose your data if required by law or to comply with legal process, to protect our rights, or to protect the safety of others. Data Security The security of your data is important to us. We use industry-standard security measures to protect your personal data. However, no method of transmission over the internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. Therefore, while we strive to protect your personal data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. Data Retention We will retain your personal data for as long as necessary to provide you with the Service and fulfill the purposes described in this Privacy Policy. We may also retain your data to comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. Your Data Rights You have the right to access, correct, delete, and restrict the processing of your personal data. You also have the right to withdraw your consent to the processing of your data at any time. Children's Privacy Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 18. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal data, please contact us. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us: gateguruindia@gmail.com 3605, Main Road, Rani Jhansi Rd, Bara Hindu Rao, Delhi, 110006, India gateguruindia@gmail.com +919810109519 Home Catalog Who We Are Our Services FAQ Contact us Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions
pages.terms: GateGuru India - Premium Gates & Entrance Solutions in India | Terms and Conditions Home Catalog Who We Are Our Services FAQ Contact us Write us GateGuru India Terms and Conditions These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your access to and use of the website and all related services offered by GateGuru India ("us", "we", or "our").
